definition: tree trunk/main part of sth/to manage/to work/to do/capable/cadre/to kill (slang)/to fuck (vulgar)

sentences.english: The combination of aconite and dried ginger perfectly reflected the relativity of seven relations.
sentences.chinese: 附子与干姜的配伍，较好的反映了配伍七情的相对性。

sentences.english: It had an apple-like flavor, but also like ginger ale.
sentences.chinese: 有苹果汁般的琥珀色，苹果风味，也像干姜水。

sentences.english: Coat inside of glass with Bitters, add ice then recipe, use Ginger Beer where available.
sentences.chinese: 杯里滴入苦酒和冰块，尽可能使用干姜啤酒。

sentences.english: Dry ginger root powder has marked anti-sea-sickness effect which is stronger than dimenhydrinate .
sentences.chinese: 干姜粉具有明显的抗晕船作用，其效果强于晕海宁。

sentences.english: No notable side effects were found in the testes after oral dry ginger root powder.
sentences.chinese: 未发现干姜粉有任何显著不良副作用。

sentences.english: Objective To verify the sea sickness preventing effect of orally taken dry ginger root powder.
sentences.chinese: 目的验证服用干姜粉预防晕船的效果。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the antiarrhythmic effect of ethyl acetate extract of Radix Ginger(EAERG).
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨干姜醋酸乙酯提取物的抗心律失常作用。

sentences.english: Fresh Ginger and Air-dry Ginger are our main products.
sentences.chinese: 我司主要生产保鲜姜和风干姜。

sentences.english: Or would you rather have a soft drink? We have seltzer or ginger ale.
sentences.chinese: 或者你更愿意喝软饮料，苏打水还是干姜水？

definition: Amomom (fructus Amomi), plant used in Chinese medicine
dried fruit of immature citron or trifoliate orange (used in TCM)
the rhizome of large-headed atractylodes (Atractylodes macrocephaia)
Achyranthes bidentata (root used in Chinese medicine)
root bark of the peony tree (used in TCM)
common water plantain (Alisma plantago-aquatica)/water plantain rhizome (used in TCM)
huangqi/milk vetch root (used in TCM)/Astragalus membranaceus or Astragalus mongholicus
